attributes.action: reduce family visa income of £38,700 make the family visa income upto £19,000
attributes.additional_details: Not to discriminate British citizen who are working hard in the  U.K. and who are paying tax
attributes.background: To make it fair and decent to British citizen who is working hard in the U.K. especially when the government is separating the spouse and that is called injustice and discrimination to British citizen it will be fair and decent for the family visa income to be £19,000 instead of £38,700

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
